# CertificateManager.KeyType enumeration

Specifies the type of cryptographic key to use for certificate operations.

Specifies the cryptographic key type.

```csharp
public enum KeyType
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Rsa | `0` | RSA key type. |
| Ecdsa | `1` | ECDSA key type. |
